wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Ernest Bonner (born 6 February 1988) is a Scottish footballer who plays for Dartford.

response: On 8 May 2013 Champion joined Cambridge United, alongside Dartford teammate Tom Bonner. He appeared in all league matches during the season, helping the club return to League Two. On 8 August 2014 Champion played in Cambridge's first match back in League Two, starting in a 1–0 home win against Plymouth Argyle.
